synopsis: Chronicles the unlikely rise to prominence of the Australia-based Christian band, Hillsong United.

synopsis: A young woman's desperate search for her abducted boyfriend draws her into the infamous Colonia Dignidad, a sect nobody ever escaped from.

synopsis: Tells the story of Jesus Christ at age seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth. Told from his childhood perspective, it follows young Jesus as he grows into his religious identity.
tagline: Before he was the savior, he was a child.
casting: ['Adam Greaves-Neal', 'Sara Lazzaro', 'Vincent Walsh', 'Sean Bean', 'Jonathan Bailey', 'Isabelle Adriani', 'Rory Keenan', 'Dorotea Mercuri', 'Jarreth J.
